sentences.english: Understands the appreciation, you also then have the enchanting graceful bearing.
sentences.chinese: 懂得欣赏，你也便拥有迷人的风姿。

sentences.english: The cedar was about five feet high and very shapely.
sentences.chinese: 那棵雪松约有五尺高，风姿优美。

sentences.english: They noticed a beautiful, slim, talkative old man.
sentences.chinese: 他们遇到了一位风姿翩翩，削瘦健谈的老人。

sentences.english: She is graceful enough to be a dancer.
sentences.chinese: 她风姿绰约，适合当一名舞蹈演员。

sentences.english: Her face is beautiful; her manner is charming; her mouth is full of honeyed words.
sentences.chinese: 她容颜姣好，风姿绰约，满口甜言蜜语。

sentences.english: Today the time-honored elegance still pervades it.
sentences.chinese: 今天，弥漫其间的优雅风姿依然如故。

sentences.english: The graceful bearing of this woman appeal to Carrie.
sentences.chinese: 这个女人的风姿征服了嘉莉的心。

sentences.english: In Hangzhou, the Beautiful scenery in a mist looks so charming and graceful .
sentences.chinese: 秀丽的杭州风景，在朦朦细雾中，显得风姿绰约。

sentences.english: Her graciousness charmed everyone all the party.
sentences.chinese: 她的风姿吸引了晚会上所有的人。

sentences.english: You 'll play in her last posture, Enron's fall.
sentences.chinese: 在你就要把玩她最后一缕风姿时，安然的飘落。

sentences.english: The manly Roman woman manager by the banner had man's manner.
sentences.chinese: 军旗旁阿谁有风格的古罗马女经理具备风姿。

sentences.english: Please give that new garment a graceful bearing .
sentences.chinese: 给那件新袍子一个风姿吧。

definition: magnificent style unmatched in his generation (idiom); peerless talent
variant of 風采|风采[feng1 cai3]
lucid and elegant/quiet and exquisite/clear and attractive style
